title: Tin Foil Hat #37: MK Ultra With Dan Cummins
description:
Thenk you for tuning into another crazy episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. Today Ryan and Sam welcome hilarious comic and host of Time Suck, Dan Cummins! This episode we got deep into the world of MK Ultra! We experienced some technical difficulties so please bear with us. Today we discuss.....
1) The birth of LSD
2) Mind Control
3) The Nuremberg Code
4) Operation Midnight Climax
5) The Grateful Dead
6) The Unabomber
7) M.A.P.S Multidisciplinary Association for Psychedelic Studies
We also give a huge shout to @birdsnatch on instagram for the amazing art he did of Sam and Ryan for the show. Thank you so much for your support. Please follow us on....
Twitter: @madhatter39ers
Instagram: @TinFoilHatpod
Reddit: Reddit.com/tinfoilhatshow
Get all of our t-shirts at AllComedyTshirts.com
